mcq.statement: Choose the CORRECT sentence: Gulliver's Travels was written by Swift., Gullivers' travel was written by Swift, Gulliver travels was writen to Swift., Gulliver travels was writen at Swift.

options.a: Gulliver's Travels was written by Swift.
options.b: Gullivers' travel was written by Swift
options.c: Gulliver travels was writen to Swift.
options.d: Gulliver travels was writen at Swift.
